entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 late this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:29 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:29 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
